mapper.select: select api.name name,api.url url,api.method method from sys_api api left join sys_role_api role_api on api.api_id = role_api.api_id left join sys_role role on role_api.role_id = role.role_id left join sys_user_role user_role on user_role.role_id = role.role_id left join sys_user user on user_role.user_id = user.user_id where user.username = #{username}
